attributes.action: TV LICENSES TO BE CANCELED IN UK
attributes.additional_details:
Your goverment collects £3.5 Billion every April
according to Lew Grade tonight on BBC tonight.
And in front of the Commitee to day with all the current and ex DirectorGenerals shows a TOTAL
lack of CONTROL of all costs.
We the PUBLIC cannot afford the TV licene an unfair
indirect Tax.
We need to stop paying all BBC staff and progs massive amounts of MONIES joe public cannot afford
If the license people donot pay court £1000 fine/jail.
But the DGS of the BBC spend to the limits with no
come back.STOP all TV licence fees NOW
